Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a go-ahead two-run homer in the bottom of the fifth inning on Friday.
Teoscar Hernandez hit a go-ahead solo shot after the Rockies tied the game in the sixth inning on Friday.
Teoscar Hernandez extended the lead with an RBI single in the bottom of the seventh inning on Friday.
Ryan McMahon hit a go-ahead homer in the top of the fifth inning on Saturday.
Shohei Ohtani hit a game-tying home run in the bottom of the ninth inning on Sunday.
Mookie Betts hit a walk-off home run in the bottom of the ninth inning on Sunday.
Post-Match Reflections: Walker Buehler felt he competed well despite surrendering four runs and hopes for better results in his next start.
The Dodgers' playoff energy was evident in their comeback win on Sunday, with Shohei Ohtani and Mookie Betts leading the charge.
